title: EPIC: Yardkit Parallel Lines MVP (worktrees + locks + Kilo phases)
Define MVP contracts + acceptance criteria for a line run
description:
Define MVP contracts for parallel line run (worktrees + locks + Kilo phases).

Acceptance Criteria:
- Specifies line-run lifecycle and success/failure states referencing [runKiloPrepPhase()](tools/yardkit/src/commands/run.ts:179) and [runKiloExecutePhase()](tools/yardkit/src/commands/run.ts:203).
- Defines artifacts/locks contract inputs/outputs and retention rules aligned with [tools/yardkit/ARTIFACTS.md](tools/yardkit/ARTIFACTS.md:1).
- Establishes required workspace/lock metadata fields referencing [WorkspaceInfo](tools/yardkit/src/types.ts:33) and [LockInfo](tools/yardkit/src/types.ts:40).
- Documents gate behavior expectations for repo-root vs worktree baseline at [runQualityGates()](tools/yardkit/src/commands/run.ts:232).

title: Workflow installation preflight (repo-managed workflows)
description:
Ensure repo-managed workflows are installed/validated prior to shift runs.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Preflight validates workflows are present under [.kilocode/workflows/](.kilocode/workflows:1) and match templates at [templates/.kilocode/](templates/.kilocode:1).
- Reports actionable error when workflows missing or stale versus templates.
- Defines preflight invocation point in Yardkit run flow referencing [runKiloPrepPhase()](tools/yardkit/src/commands/run.ts:179).
- Documents requirements in Yardkit package context at [tools/yardkit/package.json](tools/yardkit/package.json:1).

title: Implement Beads task fetch for shift
description:
Implement task retrieval for Yardkit shift from Beads.

Acceptance Criteria:
- fetches open/ready tasks and returns structured list from [fetchTasksFromBeads()](tools/yardkit/src/commands/shift.ts:91).
- Includes filtering/paging parameters documented for shift usage.
- Handles empty queue and errors with actionable messaging.
- Validates integration with Yardkit CLI entry at [tools/yardkit/src/commands/shift.ts](tools/yardkit/src/commands/shift.ts:1).

title: Implement task locking (acquire/release/heartbeat/TTL)
description:
Implement task lock lifecycle for parallel lines (acquire/release/heartbeat/TTL).

Acceptance Criteria:
- Lock acquire/release/renew semantics defined and wired for shift tasks, referencing [LockInfo](tools/yardkit/src/types.ts:40).
- Heartbeat/TTL behavior covers stale lock recovery and multi-runner safety.
- Lock artifacts stored per [tools/yardkit/ARTIFACTS.md](tools/yardkit/ARTIFACTS.md:1) (including pathing under artifacts/locks).
- Locking integrated with shift flow entry at [tools/yardkit/src/commands/shift.ts](tools/yardkit/src/commands/shift.ts:1).

title: Implement worktree allocation + cleanup
description:
Implement worktree allocation/cleanup for parallel lines.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Allocates per-task worktree with unique path and metadata referencing [WorkspaceInfo](tools/yardkit/src/types.ts:33).
- Cleans up worktree on success/failure with clear retention rules.
- Works with lock lifecycle from [LockInfo](tools/yardkit/src/types.ts:40).
- Updates artifacts/workspace records per [tools/yardkit/ARTIFACTS.md](tools/yardkit/ARTIFACTS.md:1).

title: Implement Kilo CLI invocation for prep/execute with session export/import
description:
Implement Kilo CLI invocation for prep/execute phases with session export/import.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Prep phase runs via [runKiloPrepPhase()](tools/yardkit/src/commands/run.ts:179) with export/import wiring.
- Execute phase runs via [runKiloExecutePhase()](tools/yardkit/src/commands/run.ts:203) with session handoff from prep.
- Uses repo-managed workflows preflight from [.kilocode/workflows/](.kilocode/workflows:1) prior to invocation.
- Captures CLI output and errors to artifacts per [tools/yardkit/ARTIFACTS.md](tools/yardkit/ARTIFACTS.md:1).

title: Run gates inside worktree + preserve artifacts on failure
description:
Run quality gates in worktree and preserve artifacts on failure.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Gates invoked inside allocated worktree (not repo root) per [runQualityGates()](tools/yardkit/src/commands/run.ts:232).
- Failure retains artifacts, logs, and lock metadata per [tools/yardkit/ARTIFACTS.md](tools/yardkit/ARTIFACTS.md:1).
- Successful runs clean up according to workspace policy in [WorkspaceInfo](tools/yardkit/src/types.ts:33).
- Output includes clear gate status messaging for shift operator.

title: Shift scheduler hardening (retries/backoff/cancellation semantics)
description:
Harden shift scheduler behavior for retries, backoff, and cancellation.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Implements retry/backoff policy for fetch/run failures starting from [fetchTasksFromBeads()](tools/yardkit/src/commands/shift.ts:91).
- Defines cancellation semantics for in-flight tasks and lock release references [LockInfo](tools/yardkit/src/types.ts:40).
- Emits structured status updates for operators within [tools/yardkit/src/commands/shift.ts](tools/yardkit/src/commands/shift.ts:1).
- Ensures no task double-run when lock TTL or heartbeat expires per [tools/yardkit/ARTIFACTS.md](tools/yardkit/ARTIFACTS.md:1).

title: Docs + demo: parallel shift runbook
description:
Document and demo parallel shift runbook for Yardkit.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Runbook covers workflow preflight from [.kilocode/workflows/](.kilocode/workflows:1) and templates at [templates/.kilocode/](templates/.kilocode:1).
- Includes steps for locks/worktrees referencing [LockInfo](tools/yardkit/src/types.ts:40) and [WorkspaceInfo](tools/yardkit/src/types.ts:33).
- Describes Kilo prep/execute flow with [runKiloPrepPhase()](tools/yardkit/src/commands/run.ts:179) and [runKiloExecutePhase()](tools/yardkit/src/commands/run.ts:203).
- Specifies gate run expectations (worktree + artifacts) per [runQualityGates()](tools/yardkit/src/commands/run.ts:232) and [tools/yardkit/ARTIFACTS.md](tools/yardkit/ARTIFACTS.md:1).
